channel.title: Posts on Marek Wywiał
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Marek Wywiał

item.title: Fast sentry instance using docker
item.description: How to quickly spin up private Sentry instance using only docker.

item.title: Python SOAP server (flask) + wsdl generation
item.description: Simple tutorial how quickly create SOAP server using python “Flask-Enterprise” package for “flash” web framework. Example comes with basic client using “suds” package.

item.title: quiet please !! disable audio bell in gvim
item.description: I don’t want to hear it any more, so I’ve put this into .vimrc " quiet pleeeeeease if has('autocmd') autocmd GUIEnter * set visualbell t_vb= endif

item.title: Rescan SCSI bus (no reboot)
item.description: Just self memo. How to attach new SCSI disk without reboot (debian): # check what hosts do you have ls /sys/class/scsi_host host0 host1 host2 host3 # change 'host0' to 'host1' or any next number that you need echo "- - -" > /sys/class/scsi_host/host0/scan and done fdisk -l

item.title: extend lvm2 filesystem
item.description: Just self memo # Added new physical partition /dev/sda3 # create a physical volume out of it $ pvcreate /dev/sda3 # Now, add it to the volume group #that my logical volume is on $ vgextend VolGroup00 /dev/sda3 # Now that the volume group has more # disk space, the logical volume can grow $ lvextend -L+11G /dev/VolGroup00/LogVol00 # Ok, last of all, I want to filesystem to # recognize that more space is available $ fsadm resize /dev/VolGroup00/LogVol00 # sweet, I have more space now $ df -h
